entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
